name: How it sounds to be a Ghost
name_original: How it sounds to be a Ghost
description:
This is just a small sound experience where you control a friendly ghost (a white square) who try to scour its suroundings.

There is no menu, the experience will launch automatically. Just use arrow keys to move and enjoy!

Meet the team : 

Game design / Level design : Valentin Nicolats, Nicolas Taupin
